games.name: Retros-Bear-tic
games.caption: Puzzle game built in collaboration with one other person for Touhou Fan Game Jam 13 with extented time.
games.description:
Decided on aesthetics to fit the game jam theme.
All game sprites drawn using Procreate.
Your job is to help Cirno figure out how to bring everyone back from being a bear before the day ends

games.name: Cirno's Rythm Revenge
games.caption: Rythm game built in collaboration with one other person for Touhou Fan Game Jam 12.
games.description:
All Touhou characters are redesigned as round birds (inspired by the Long-tailed tit).
Game built with Unity engine
All game sprites and anination drawn using Procreate.
Was unable to complete in time due to external factors.

games.name: Cirno's Perfect Snowbash
games.caption: Game built in collaboration with one other person for Touhou Fan Game Jam 10 within 72 hours.
games.description:
As the player you will play as a Touhou character of your choice and engage in a snowball fight with Cirno.
Opponent is controlled by AI implemented within jam period.
All game sprites and anination drawn using Procreate.
Play with audio on :)

games.name: Be Good
games.caption: Puzzle simulation game made for Mini Jam 97 in collaboration with one other person.
games.description:
A game where you try to help the doggos not break the plant pots and get treats.
All assets drawn and designed during jam period using Procreate.
